title: Cloud Engineer

sections.full_text:
Cloud Engineer
SkyOps Ottawa, ON

Responsibilities:
- Build and manage AWS cloud infrastructure
- Develop Terraform modules for IaC automation
- Implement CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
- Troubleshoot networking and deployment issues
sections.skills:
- AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, ECS)
- Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes
- Bash or Python scripting

Preferred:

full_text_snippet:
Cloud Engineer 
SkyOps Ottawa, ON

Responsibilities:
- Build and manage AWS cloud infrastructure
- Develop Terraform modules for IaC automation
- Implement CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
- Troubleshoot networking and deployment issues

Required Skills:
- AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, ECS)
- Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes
- Bash or Python scripting

Preferred:
- Experience with serverless (Lambda)
